name: TankShooter-Test
description:
Just a personal project to test 3D top down shooting game.

Using these awesome assets:

- Tank: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/cartoon-tank-free-165189#

- Monsters: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/rpg-monster-duo-pbr-polyart-157762

- Nature: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-nature-pack-lite-40444
